result.purpose: Responsible for managing devices within the application, including configuration, routing, and dependency injection.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for better separation of concerns and easier testing.

cmd/device_manager/config.go.purpose: Defines the configuration structure for the device manager application.

cmd/device_manager/main.go.purpose: Initializes and starts the device manager application.

cmd/device_manager/routes.go.purpose: Defines routes for device management with private and public groups in a web service.

cmd/device_manager/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the device manager application using Google Wire.

cmd/device_manager/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for the device manager application.
